short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your personal Companion to offer protection, analyze, summarize, optimize and hide harmful content; all to keep you safe online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Candor Companion is an AI-powered browser extension designed to create safe, inclusive, and productive online learning environments. We leverage advanced Large Language Models to provide unparalleled real-time content filtering and hate speech detection and removal, tailored to the unique needs and values of each user, as well as a powerful browser extension that evaluates the safety of blockchain wallets and smart contracts with a unique Ï† (phi) score algorithm, and helps users avoid dangerous interactions, malicious users and potential scams, phishing attacks and spam. Features include: 

#### IEP Accommodations
- ADD / ADHD
- Dyscalculia
- Dyslexia
- Executive Functioning

#### Features
- Summary of content
- Restatement of content
- Ask a question
- Bold the first 3 letters
- Implement Open Dyslexic Fonts
- Identify harmful content
- Allow personal content filtering
